fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: Free energy fix The Outdoor Travel Show (0870 010 9085) is being held from Friday to Sunday in London. 'Energise your Weekend', at the Business Design Centre in Islington, will show you how to pack the most fun possible into a couple of days. Tickets are £12 for adults and £6 for the under-16s and concessions. We have 50 pairs of tickets to give away to the first 50 readers to phone the ticket hotline and quote WHT. All other readers can purchase two tickets for the price of one when quoting the code. The offer closes Thursday. Two for one The Independent Traveller's World exhibition (0870 386 0999), at the same venue as above from 20-22 February, will feature leading operators and numerous tourist boards, all offering advice and deals. Travel writing, photography, and wine tasting seminars will be held. Entry is £5 but Observer readers can take this page to get two in for the price of one. Mobile guide If you get lost in a foreign city, instead of phoning for help, you could use a downloadable CityPicks mobile-phone travel guide, produced by Lonely Planet and Nokia. Guides to 20 major cities have been released; they list the best restaurants, bars, shops and hotels and are compatible with the Nokia Series 40 and 60 phones. To find out more, visit www.shop.nokia.co.uk and click on Applications.
